description: This file defines a ProductsService class that manages an in-memory store of products, including methods for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and calculating total inventory value. It also includes a validation function for product payloads.

classes.name: ProductsService
classes.description: A class providing CRUD operations and inventory calculations for products stored in-memory.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns the list of all products.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a product by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new product after validating the payload.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Fully updates an existing product identified by ID.

methods.name: totalValue
methods.description: Calculates the total inventory value as sum of price * quantity for all products.
